name: Large Geo Slime
desc:
Monsters created through the buildup of Geo within the earth.
They can harden the energy within their bodies into a carapace of stone that protects them and prevents damage. The legend of a "Golden Geo Slime King" once circulated among the Treasure Hoarders. They believed that since gemstones and ores have Geo energy in them, Geo Slimes, which also contain Geo energy, may also be a type of gemstone or ore.

value.text: A slime that uses a sturdy <color=#ffe14b>Geo shield</color> to protect itself. If you use <color=#ffe14b>heavy Geo attacks</color> , a <color=#ffe14b>claymore</color> , or strong <color=#ffe14b>explosions</color> , you should be able to break through its defenses...

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Slime Condensate
dropMaterial.desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

dropMaterial.name: Slime Secretions
dropMaterial.desc: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

dropMaterial.name: Slime Concentrate
dropMaterial.desc: Concentrated slime essence. When left alone, it will begin to move on its own.
